meanings.definition: Superlative form of reechy: emitting a strong, unpleasant smell
meanings.sent1: The garbage can was the reechiest thing in the alley.
meanings.sent2: The reechiest odor filled the room, making everyone cover their noses.
meanings.sent3: Despite the reechiest smell, the chef continued to cook the fish.
meanings.sent4: The reechiest stench hung in the air like a dark cloud.
meanings.sent5: The reechiest aroma from the sewer made me gag uncontrollably.

meanings.definition: Superlative form of reechy: dirty or grimy
meanings.sent1: After playing in the mud, the children were the reechiest they had ever been.
meanings.sent2: The reechiest clothes were thrown in the laundry basket for washing.
meanings.sent3: The dog came back from the park looking reechiest, covered in dirt and leaves.
meanings.sent4: The reechiest hands showed the hard work the gardener had put in all day.
meanings.sent5: The reechiest floor in the house needed a good scrubbing to shine again.
